scripts.db:generate: docker exec -it rebirth_talk_backend sh -c "npx drizzle-kit generate"
scripts.db:generate-name: docker exec -it rebirth_talk_backend sh -c "npx drizzle-kit generate --name $npm_config_name"
scripts.db:migrate: docker exec -it rebirth_talk_backend sh -c " npx drizzle-kit migrate"
scripts.db:seed: docker exec -it rebirth_talk_backend sh -c " node src/database/seeders/index.js "
scripts.db:seed-category: docker exec -it rebirth_talk_backend sh -c " node src/database/seeders/category-seeder.js "
scripts.db:seed-proxy: docker exec -it rebirth_talk_backend sh -c " node src/database/seeders/proxy-seeder.js "
scripts.db:migrate-undo: docker exec -it rebirth_talk_backend sh -c " npx drizzle-kit drop"
